label: 五経
対訳語: The Five Classics - Wu-ching in Chinese.
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: Being five of the great Chinese or Confucian Classics, namely, 1. I-ching (Classic of Changes), 2. Shu-ching (Classic of History), 3. Shih-ching (Classic of Poetry), 4. Ch'un-ch'iu (Spring and Autumn Annals), 5. Li-chi (Book of Rites).  [易経、書経、詩経、春秋、礼記]
